body.name: 24 inches Push Broom Outdoor Heavy Duty Broom for Deck Driveway Garage Yard Patio Concrete Floor Cleaning-Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Extra Long Handle Outdoor Broom- Garden broom outdoor with 63" long handle comes in four sections , 45°angle, ergonomic design, reduce the pain in the knees and back while do housework,stiff broom head and the handle are in threaded connection, which is not easy to loosen.

6 Layer Hard Bristle-The garden brush outdoor is finished with 6 Layer stiff bristles for sweeping heavy things with forward speed or efficiency,such as grass, soil, sands, snow, leaves which tend to stick to the ground,plus ,it is suitable for using in wet or dry conditions,won't be rotten and deformed like a wooden broom.

24" Wide Stiff Broom-The garden brush head has great width for sweeping wide area with a generous amount of bristles ,it has two handle slot ,can be swapped sides if you find the bristles are wearing unevenly.

Easy to Care-Heavy duty snow broom, special little brackets that allow you to attach the broom-head to the broom handle, can be locked when not use, can hang on the wall which save your storage space.

Multipurpose Garden Broom Outdoor-The angled design is easier to push than upright brooms,versatilely clean many types of rough floors in warehouse, garage, balcony, deck, pool, garden, patio, porch, sidewalk, stadium and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Garage Floor
reviews.reviewText: I have three animals and when the weather is bad and they can't get out, they use a doggie/cat door to go into the garage to do their business. We are constantly cleaning up and I wanted this stiff broom to make scrubbing the floor after cleaning up the mess easier. This broom is so handy and we can push water and soap around, and rinse water. It also took a bucket of bleach and soap, and then the cleaning after we rinsed the floor. Made this job so much easier. I prefer not having to walk them in bad weather, and they wouldn't go anyway. So, using the garage has been great. The cat has her litter box out there...the dogs soon followed the cat outside and have pads and an area for their "business." They miss the pads a lot of the time. But, there's nothing in the house in our living space. Now the garage floor can really be scrubbed clean when they miss the pads. This brush really adds to the ease of cleaning up with it's bristles and ability to scrub the floor. The other broom brush we had was pitiful and not stiff enough to really scrub. We scrubbed the patio and even the deck with it (of course, we clean the brushes with a bleach mixture between jobs).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great porch brush
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to assemble. It’s a smaller brush size, but worked great with removing dirt and leaves. Bristles are stiff and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Solid For the Price
reviews.reviewText: The broom works pretty well. It’s sturdy enough to get the job done but it’s not really heavy duty. Given the cost, I’m happy with it. And it was easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy to assemble, stiff but soft enough, perfect for garage/driveway/walkways outside house
reviews.reviewText: This broom is sturdy enough for heavy handed sweeping on my concrete driveway, walkways around my house, my garage, patio, etc.. Great for sweeping larger debris/leaves, also effectively sweeps up sawdust and finer debris. Really simple assembly. It’s super easy to use because it’s surprisingly lightweight for how sturdy it is. For a 6’1 person, the broomstick is plenty long (with all sections of it assembled), and does not make you feel like you’re hunched over or straining your back while using it. Stores well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble. Very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broom head works great, handle doesn’t
reviews.reviewText: The bristles are strong and hold well, don’t rip out or bend easy. However, the handle does bend easy, the endcap pops off, and once it starts bending it doesn’t telescope anymore. I weigh 135 pounds and bent it after a couple uses, and now I can’t extend or contract it. Had to buy a new broom handle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love our push broom. It’s perfect for the garage and its intended use. Great quality broom, NOT cheaply made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Size is great for indoor use, wife seems happy with the product. It appears solid and durable. The bristles are I’d say about a medium stiffness, it’s easy to use and works well.
